name: K I N D E R G A R T E N
name_original: K I N D E R G A R T E N
description:
The kindergarten, a forgotten hospital that ws once the peak of medical research, now is your job ti find out it's secrets and resolve the mistery hidden inside it's walls.

How to:

Left click - move around
Double left click- run
Left click on objects to interact whit them
Right click- on items and special objects to get information.

Try to find all the expedients.
